titleInfo.title: Beulah Lake on Riverside drive. Monroe. Supplied with salt water from a gas well

mods.abstract: Camera looking across water to houses along a street on other side. See also similar view at F1009a. Print is punctured on lower right. This lake still existed in 1932 but does not appear to exist now.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Ecology and Conservation, The Percy Viosca Jr. Collection
